byline.contributor: Alan Blinder and Steve Eder contributed reporting.
byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and MAGGIE HABERMAN

abstract: Republican presidential candidates Ted Cruz, Marco Rubio and Donald J Trump exchange loaded barbs in days leading up to Super Tuesday; Sen Cruz and Sen Rubio release tax forms and taunt rival Trump for not doing same.
lead_paragraph: With three days to go before the so-called Super Tuesday voting contests, the Florida senator is increasingly resembling Mr. Trump, who he is chasing in the polls.

headline.main: Marco Rubio and Donald Trump Open New Fronts in War of Playground Insults
headline.print_headline: Trump and Rubio Open New Fronts in a War of Playground Insults

snippet: With three days to go before the so-called Super Tuesday voting contests, the Florida senator is increasingly resembling Mr. Trump, who he is chasing in the polls.
